name: @vlsergey/react-indexdb-cache
description: Flexible indexdb-backed cache for react application

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p ./src/tsconfig-cjs.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p ./src/tsconfig-esm.json
scripts.test:watch:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=development karma start karma.conf.js --no-single-run --browsers Chrome
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run eslint:fix && npm test && npm run clean && npm run build

author: Sergey Vladimirov a.k.a. vlsergey (vlsergey {at} gmail {dot} com)
